forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 7am, then rain and snow showers likely between 7am and noon, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. East northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
